title: Suggestions are Fun!
author: verias
text:
So, someone suggested a swap of outfits from Theresa and Chrys' original and very first kiss.

Granted! It's not quite the exact outfit, because i thought maybe Chrys has a little different taste in undies, but all in all, this was rather fun to do. I still have the Mandrake idea percolating, but I'm still taking suggestions and ideas for more inbetween stuff.

J's prepping for GenCon and he's working on recharging his batteries so he can get back to writing. I'm glad you guys are sticking it out with us!
